Newcastle United star Allan Saint-Maximin is going to be looking for a new club this summer, believes transfer insider Dean Jones.
The Frenchman has been linked with a move away from St James’ Park,… [+2305 chars]

articles.title: Jose Mourinho takes swipe at Tottenham over sacking as he bids to end Roma’s 14-year wait for trophy... - talkSPORT
articles.content:
Jose Mourinho took a not so subtle swipe at Tottenham over the timing of his sacking by Daniel Levy.
